member.summary: Main entry of the Controller

member.summary: Execute a report initiated in a previous execution

member.summary: Navigate to a new report execution: Either for Drill or SubReport

member.summary: Return the current Navigation links for a report execution

member.summary: Refresh the report for a report execution

member.summary: Return the Result of a report execution

member.summary: Return the result output of a report execution

member.summary: Cancel a report execution

member.summary: Update the value of a view parameter of a report execution

member.summary: Return the result of a report execution for a given format

member.summary: Return the table data of a Page (for DataTables server Pagination)

member.summary: Update values chosen for an Enum in a report execution

member.summary: Return the list of values for a Enumerated list with a filter for a report execution

member.summary: Execute a report and parse the views involved when triggered from a Restrictions View

member.summary: Execute a report in a new window when triggered from a Restrictions View

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWILogin(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Start a session with the Web Report Server using the user name, password, token (may be optional according to the authentication configured on the server) and returns information of the logged user (SWIUserProfile).

member.summary: Check the security code for a 2 factors authentication

member.summary: Reset a user password

member.summary: Re-init a user password from a reset password link

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWIChangePassword(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Change a user password

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWIGetRootMenu(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the menu of the logged user.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWIGetRootFolders(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all the folders of the user (including Personal folders).

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWIGetFolderDetail(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the list of file names and details contained in a folder.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWISearch(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the list of file names and details matching a search in the repository.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWIDeleteFolder(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Delete a sub-folder in the repository. The folder must be empty.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWICreateFolder(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a sub-folder in the repository.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWIRenameFolder(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Rename a sub-folder in the repository.

member.summary: Returns the views and outputs of a report.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWIDeleteFiles(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Delete files or reports from the repository.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWIMoveFile(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Move a file or a report in the repository.

member.summary: Execute a report into a report result and returns the result. Check API of Seal Web Interface for more information.

member.summary: Execute a report and returns the report html display result content (e.g. html with prompted restrictions). Check API of Seal Web Interface for more information.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWViewFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: View a file published in the repository.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWUploadFile(System.String)
member.summary: Upload a file in a repository folder.

member.summary: Mark/Unmark report as favorite.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWILogout(System.String)
member.summary: Clear the current user session.

member.summary: Set the culture for the logged user.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWIGetUserProfile(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the profile information of the logged user.

member.summary: Save the configuration of the Web Server (including security).

member.summary: Returns the configuration of the web server (including security).

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWIGetCultures
member.summary: Return the list of Cultures available

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWITranslate(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Translate a text either from the public translations or the repository translations. If the optional parameter instance is not empty, the repository translations are used.

member.name: M:SealWebServer.Controllers.HomeController.SWIGetVersions
member.summary: Returns the version of the Seal Web Interface and the version of the Seal Library.

member.summary: If true, only this authentication is enabled
